column2: stsal pa / kun dga' bo / de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya bar zungs shig / de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dvags so //

column1: iti DAraya idam avocat BagavAn Atta manAH te BikzavaH AyuzmAn ca AnandaH BagavataH
column2: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo yi rangs te / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do // 'phags pa rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs so ////
